page.title: 15EDUCATION - PLAYTIME
page.content: We have a big playground, an adventure and a big field. We play chicken fights where two people walk on a log supported above the ground on blocks and we try to push each other off. Trisha and her friends play 44. This is when a person hides her eyes and counts up to 44 while the other children hide. The counter then goes to look for the other children. If she sees them she rushes back to the counting post and shouts out '44, I see ....', whoever it was. The children can save themselves by getting back to the post before they are called out. If the last child gets back, they can save all of them and the counter has to do it again. Most of the boys like playing football which is very boring. We do handstands and skipping and sing songs.
